an6.80:1.1: “Chahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannagato bhikkhu nacirasseva mahantattam vepullattam papunati dhammesu.
an6.80:1.3: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu alokabahulo ca hoti yogabahulo ca vedabahulo ca asantutthibahulo ca anikkhittadhuro ca kusalesu dhammesu uttari ca patareti.
an6.80:1.4: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, chahi dhammehi samannagato bhikkhu nacirasseva mahantattam vepullattam papunati dhammesu”ti.
